value.title: Plan and implement data platform resources
value.excerpt: Deploy data platform resources in Azure for SQL Server and Open Source databases. Explore options for upgrade and migration.  Calculate resource requirements and create templates.

topItems.title: Deploy SQL Server in a virtual machine
topItems.excerpt: Configure virtual machine sizing, storage, and networking options to ensure adequate performance for your database workloads. Choose and configure appropriate high availability options. Investigate options for migrating existing workloads.

topItems.title: Deploy Azure SQL Database
topItems.excerpt: Provision and deploy Azure SQL Database and SQL Server Managed Instances. Select the appropriate options when performing a migration to the SQL PaaS platform.

topItems.title: Deploy MariaDB, MySQL, and PostgreSQL on Azure
topItems.excerpt: Compare Open Source Azure Database offerings with Azure SQL Server offerings. Configure an Open Source database and configure high availability and security options.

value.title: Build a .NET Core app for Azure Cosmos DB in Visual Studio Code
value.excerpt: Learn how to create a .NET Core application to store and query data in Azure Cosmos DB by using Visual Studio Code.

value.title: Deploy consistent infrastructure in Azure by using Azure Resource Manager (ARM) templates
value.excerpt: Write Azure Resource Manager templates by using Visual Studio Code to deploy your infrastructure to Azure consistently and reliably.

value.title: Deploy batch inference pipelines with Azure Machine Learning
value.excerpt: Machine learning models are often used to generate predictions from large numbers of observations in a batch process. To accomplish this, you can use Azure Machine Learning to publish a batch inference pipeline.

value.title: Deploy SQL Server in a virtual machine
value.excerpt: Configure virtual machine sizing, storage, and networking options to ensure adequate performance for your database workloads. Choose and configure appropriate high availability options. Investigate options for migrating existing workloads.

value.title: Describe lazy evaluation and other performance features in Azure Databricks
value.excerpt: Describe lazy evaluation and other performance features in Azure Databricks

value.title: Design a bot conversation flow
value.excerpt: Learn the principles of good bot design and implement conversational flows, knowledge bots, and how to hand-off interactions to a human.

value.title: Enterprise-scale architecture organizational design principles
value.excerpt: Enterprise-scale architecture organizational design principles

value.title: Explain machine learning models with Azure Machine Learning
value.excerpt: Many decisions made by organizations and automated systems today are based on predictions made by machine learning models. It's increasingly important to be able to understand the factors that influence the predictions models make.

value.title: Get started with Azure Quantum
value.excerpt: Learn how to get started with Azure Quantum and create an Azure Quantum workspace.

value.title: Implement error handling and logging in Go
value.excerpt: Understand how to handle errors and log helpful information in your Go programs.

value.title: Implement CI/CD with Azure DevOps
value.excerpt: Implement CI/CD with Azure DevOps

value.title: Improve the developer experience of an API with Swagger documentation
value.excerpt: Learn how to document an existing API, written in C#/ASP.NET Core, using Swashbuckle, Swagger/OpenAPI, and Swagger UI.

value.title: Plan and implement privileged access
value.excerpt: Plan and implement privileged access

value.title: Prepare on-premises workloads for migration to Azure
value.excerpt: Prepare on-premises workloads for migration to Azure

value.excerpt: Combine multiple tables with JOINs in T-SQL

value.title: Run functional tests in Azure Pipelines
value.excerpt: Run Selenium UI tests, a form of functional testing, in Azure Pipelines.

value.title: Write automated tests
value.excerpt: Learn about the types of testing you can do with Rust.

value.title: Upload your project by using GitHub best practices
value.excerpt: Learn to upload your existing project to GitHub.

value.title: Work with Compute in Azure Machine Learning
value.excerpt: Learn how to manage compute contexts for experiments in Azure Machine Learning.

value.title: Work with DataFrames advanced methods in Azure Databricks
value.excerpt: Work with DataFrames advanced methods in Azure Databricks

value.title: Secure a Windows Virtual Desktop deployment
value.excerpt: Introduction to Microsoft security capabilities that can keep your applications and data secure in your Windows Virtual Desktop deployment.

value.title: How to build and deploy a containerized app to Azure Kubernetes Service (AKS) | Azure Friday
value.excerpt: Jay Gordon (@jaydestro) joins Donovan Brown (@donovanbrown) to show how to build a containerized React application and deploy it to production with Azure Kubernetes Service. He'll also show how to configure an Azure Active Directory service principal to enable Role-Based Authentication, which enables
value.featuredContent: <iframe width="800" height="500" frameborder="0" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/E9YWmbUb9Ps" allow="accelerometer; autoplay; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture" allowfullscreen></iframe>

value.title: Planning Azure for SAP workloads
value.excerpt: As an IT Professional experienced in SAP solutions, you need to learn about how to leverage Azure resources that include virtual machines, virtual networks, storage accounts, and Azure AD. These modules will give you the Azure knowledge around the reference architecture for SAP Workloads, how to plan for the implementation of SAP solutions on Azure, and the preparation for your migration of SAP workloads to Azure.

topItems.title: Utilize Azure for SAP workloads reference architecture
topItems.excerpt: Utilize Azure for SAP Workloads Reference Architecture

topItems.title: Planning for implementing SAP solutions on Azure
topItems.excerpt: Planning for implementing SAP solutions on Azure

topItems.title: Prepare to migrate SAP workloads to Azure
topItems.excerpt: This module provides details on the important steps prior to deploying SAP workloads to Azure: project preparation and planning, pilot, non-production, production preparation, go live, and post production.

value.title: Define an AI strategy to create value in education
value.excerpt: Explore the strategic components, special factors, and use cases of an AI strategy in education that creates value, with INSEAD and Microsoft.

value.title: Define an AI strategy to create business value in manufacturing
value.excerpt: Explore the strategic components, special factors, and use cases of an AI strategy in manufacturing that creates business value, with INSEAD and Microsoft.

value.title: Optimize compute costs on Azure Kubernetes Service (AKS)
value.excerpt: Explore strategies that you can use on Azure to optimize your cloud-native application-development process by using Azure Kubernetes Service (AKS).

value.title: Create a user interface with decentralized apps
value.excerpt: Learn about decentralized apps and how to build your own.

value.title: Build a web API with Node.js and Express
value.excerpt: Use Express for Node.js to build RESTful APIs. Create and configure middleware to add things like logging and authentication/authorization. Use JavaScript/TypeScript with Express to create a Node.js web server with Visual Studio Code.
